SELECT FLNO,DATE_ADD(SOBT,INTERVAL 7 DAY) SOBT FROM T_LOCAL_FLIGHT_INFO WHERE ISDEL<>'1' AND FLIGHT_TASK IN ('W/Z','C/B','L/W') AND D_OR_A='D' AND EXEC_DATE=DATE_SUB(#{execDate,jdbcType=DATE},INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND ASSOCIATED_FLIGHT_ID IS NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(SOBT,'%H:%i') <= '11:00' ORDER BY SOBT

SELECT TA.STAND FROM T_AREA_STAND TA LEFT JOIN T_EARLY_DEICING TB ON TA.STAND = TB.STAND AND TB.EXEC_DATE=#{execDate,jdbcType=DATE} WHERE TA.AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TB.STAND IS NULL ORDER BY TA.STAND;

SELECT TA.FLNO,TA.EXEC_DATE execDate,TA.SOBT,TA.AREA,TA.STAND,TB.LON,TB.LAT FROM T_EARLY_DEICING TA LEFT JOIN T_AREA_STAND TB ON TA.STAND = TB.STAND WHERE TA.EXEC_DATE=#{execDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND TA.STAND IS NOT NULL ORDER BY STAND
